channel.title: Spring on Devflection
channel.description: Recent content in Spring on Devflection

item.title: When to initialize a heavy dynamic lookup structure
item.description: In this post, I want to explore a problem I am facing at my day job - when to generate a heavy dynamic lookup structure the app needs to process requests. We will look at the different options, reason through the pros and cons, and then also look at implementations of the different options in an example project.
